risks.name: SRIOVFailedToConfigureVF
risks.message: OCP Versions 4.14.34, 4.15.25, 4.16.7 and ALL subsequent versions include kernel datastructure changes which are not compatible with older versions of the SR-IOV operator. Please update SR-IOV operator to versions dated 20240826 or newer before updating OCP.

risks.name: OAuthServerDownIfSpaceInIDPName
risks.message:
The OAuth server may crash-loop if either of the following conditions is met:

* At least two password-based IDPs have been configured in the OAuth configuration custom resource, and one of them contains a white space in its name. If the "kube:admin" user has not been removed from a cluster, then this already counts as an IDP. Currently, the supported password-based IDPs are HTPasswd, Keystone, LDAP, and BasicAuth.

* At least one OAuth IDP with a white space in its name has been configured. Currently, the supported OAuth IDPs are OpenID, GitHub, GitLab and Google.

risks.name: OVNLocalnetWithNoSubnets
risks.message:
Clusters with localnet topology networks with no subnets defined (configuration typical for OpenShift Virtualization)
would fail to update and create new workloads.

promql.promql:
(
  group by (_id, resource) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id="",resource="network-attachment-definitions.k8s.cni.cncf.io"}[1h]) > 0)
  or on (_id)
  0 * label_replace(group by (_id) (max_over_time(apiserver_storage_objects{_id=""}[1h])), "resource", "no-network_attachment-definitions", "resource", ".*")
)
* on (_id) group_left (name)
(
  group by (_id, name) (csv_succeeded{_id="", name=~"kubevirt-hyperconverged-operator[.].*"})
  or on (_id)
  0 * label_replace(group by (_id) (csv_succeeded{_id=""}), "name", "not hyperconverged", "name", ".*")
)

risks.name: PreRelease
risks.message: This is a prerelease version, and you should update to 4.16.0 or later releases, even if that means updating to a newer 4.15 first.

risks.name: PreRelease
risks.message: This is a prerelease version, and you should update to 4.17.0 or later releases, even if that means updating to a newer 4.16 first.

risks.name: OpenStackAvailabilityZoneOutOfRange
risks.message: OpenStack clusters with more compute availability zones than storage availability zones can lose the ability to provision or deprovision Cinder CSI volumes.

promql.promql:
group by (_id, type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id="",type="OpenStack"})
or on (_id)
0 * group by (_id, type) (cluster_infrastructure_provider{_id=""})

risks.name: PreRelease
risks.message: This is a prerelease version, and you should update to 4.16.0 or later releases, even if that means updating to a newer 4.15 first.

risks.name: TechPreviewSignatureStoresInDefault
risks.message: Standalone clusters in the default feature set will fail to verify signatures when asked to update out to later releases.

promql.promql:
0 * group by (invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or on (_id)
group by (name) (cluster_feature_set{_id="",name=""})
or on (_id)
0 * group by (name) (cluster_feature_set{_id=""})

The OAuth server may crash-loop if either of the following conditions is met:

risks.name: HyperShiftNodePoolSkewBinaryDownload
risks.message: Hosted/HyperShift clusters where HostedCluster is on an exposed release can fail to create new nodes for NodePools on 4.14.(z<34) and 4.15.(z<23).

promql.promql:
group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id="",invoker="hypershift"})
or
0 * group by (_id, invoker) (cluster_installer{_id=""})

risks.message: This is a prerelease version, and you should update to 4.16.0 or later releases, even if that means updating to a newer 4.15 first.

risks.name: CSRNotApprovedBadCerts
risks.message: Clusters born in 4.13 and earlier may not have CSRs automatically approved because of missing groups in installer client certificates.

promql.promql:
topk(1,
  label_replace(group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version=~"4[.]([0-9]|1[0-3])[.].*"}),"born_by_4_13", "yes, so possibly actually born in 4.13 or earlier", "", "")
  or
  label_replace(0 * group by (version) (cluster_version{_id="",type="initial",version!~"4[.]([0-9]|1[0-3])[.].*"}),"born_by_4_13", "no, born in 4.13 or later", "", "")
)

risks.name: FCoEBootFromSANKernelDriverQedf
risks.message: Nodes in clusters that utilize FCoE boot from SAN on devices that use the qedf kernel driver will fail to boot after updating.

risks.name: NUMAResourcesOperatorCrashLoopBackOff
risks.message: Critical pods in the NUMA Resources Operator will start to CrashLoopBackOff due to new SELinux changes.
